title: Smart farming prototype for monitoring and automatic plant watering in chili greenhouses based on IoT with ESP 32 and Blynk.
description: Smart farming prototype for monitoring and automatic plant watering in chili greenhouses based on IoT with ESP 32 and Blynk.

title: IoT-Based Device for Sorting Coffee Cherries by Ripeness Level
description: Designing a PCB for ESP32 using the EasyEDA website, programming it in C with Arduino IDE software, and creating an interface using the Blynk website.

title: lecturer research-smart irrigation system for Granola G0 potato seedlings
description: This smart irrigation system uses an Arduino Uno Robodyn with pH, DHT22, and DS18B20 sensors to monitor Granola G0 potato seedlings. Data is shown on a web interface, allowing remote and automatic watering based on plant needs.

title: Design and Construction of a 3-Axis ASRS for Electronic Components in the Analog Laboratory of Politeknik Negeri Semarang
description: ASRS Electronic Components is an automated storage and retrieval system that uses servos as its actuators. This device has 2 servos for the X and Y axis, and a stepper motor for the Z axis. The X axis moves left and right, the Y axis moves up and down, the Z axis moves forward and backward, and it uses a PLC as its controller.
